skill_constraints: Key person dependency on Senior Developer for security; DevOps capacity limited to 50%.
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps availability for CI/CD issues; Senior developer for security reviews.
mitigation_strategies: Cross-training, detailed documentation, use of contractors for non-critical tasks.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and integration overhead for the new developer.
resource_bottlenecks: Coordination overhead; QA capacity may become a bottleneck with faster development.
mitigation_strategies: Add one Mid-level Backend Developer. Assign Senior Dev to lead a sub-team and handle integration.
